original_title: Sri Lanka Name Squad for Afghanistan Test
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka Cricket announced the squad for Afghanistan Test that will be played in Colombo, starting this weekend.
Dhananjaya de Silva will lead the 16-man squad against Afghanistan. The one-off Test between the two sides takes place between 2 and 6 February at the Colombo SSC.
